name: Cube Wars (naxoregames)
description:
Experimental Impossible Top-Down Shooter. On a  platform, you control a yellow cube and kill the red ones that are trying to kill you.

This is my first game launched as a test to see if this kind of game appeals to people. 

How to play: 

Move: W/S(Up/Down), A/D(Left/Right)

Run: Left Shift + "Move"

Rotate: Left Arrow(Rotate Left), Right Arrow(Rotate Right)

Shoot: Space

Pause: Escape

Your donations and feedback are greatly appreciated!

Also, please consider following me on instagram: Instagram.com/naxoregames and on Patreon: patreon.com/naxoregames
